description:
Analyzes user questions and solve patterns to identify common misconceptions in their understanding. Proactively surfaces explanations that address these specific misconceptions before they solidify.

**Rationale:** Misconceptions are a major barrier to learning. Early detection and targeted correction prevents students from building knowledge on faulty foundations, significantly improving learning outcomes.
title: Misconception Detection and Correction
